products.title: Skye Raven Black (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure skye raven black (blackout) velux windows 1992-2001 from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux windows 1992-2001 online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Palermo (blackout), black - loft blind made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathr
products.productdescription: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor.Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Black Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.metadescription: Unilux pvc blackout black velux keylite fakro dakstra in black. Made to measure from 34.52 with free uk mainland delivery. This velux keylite fakro dakstra includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their unilux pvc blackout roof blinds come in their most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. 
 
This option comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework. 
 
This flame retardant fabric has an fibreglass core and provides up to 20% heat loss reduction.
 
 Product id: db-srb0034 fabric colour: black material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample   energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Infusion Solar Black Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Infusion solar black pleated skylight blind in black. Made to measure from 40.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This pleated skylight blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. 
 The infusion solar black pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. 
  
 
 Product id: db-pls0009 fabric colour: black headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.   Control type: pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Roller, 4069 Black - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roller, 4069 black - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charg
products.productdescription: Softens the incoming light.Offers both privacy and good looks.Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system.Fully integrated into the roof window.For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience! The solar-rechargeable battery holds enough charge for up to 600 operations, even if there is no direct sunlight for recharging. Please note that the wall mounted control can also be used as a free standing remote control or if necessary, the blind can also be operated manually.

products.title: Roman Blind, 6519 Structured Black  - VELUX Loft Blind
products.metadescription: Roman blind, 6519 structured black  - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.Installs in minutes with the u
products.productdescription: Soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning.Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click! System.

products.title: Black (1047)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure black (1047) velux energy blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux energy blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux energy blinds offers variable blackout and an insulation effect of up to 19%. The double-pleated blackout cloth has an aluminium honeycomb structure within for significantly improved insulation. Energy blinds are not fixed at the top of the bottom, so you can position them exactly where you need them for light control and privacy.

 	Blackout effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Improved insulation.
 	Sleek design - no visible cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	12 colour choices.
